#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
#include<vector>
#include<math.h>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<map>
#include<bitset>
typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;
/*long long gcd(long long a,long long b)
{
    while(b)
    {
        long long r=a%b;
        a=b;
        b=r;
    }
    return a;
}
signed long long choose(int n,int k)
{
    if(k==0)
        return 1;
    else
    {
        long long f=1;
        if(k>n-k)
            k=n-k;
        int p=1;
        while(p<=k)
        {
            f*=n--;
            f/=p++;
        }
        return f;
    }
}*/
int power(int x, unsigned int y)
{
    if( y == 0)
        return 1;
    else if (y%2 == 0)
        return power(x, y/2)*power(x, y/2);
    else
        return x*power(x, y/2)*power(x, y/2);

}
/*ll sum(ll n)
{
    ll s=0;
    while(n!=0)
    {
        s+=n%10;
        n=n/10;
    }
    return s;
}
bool cmp(int a,int b)
{
	return a>b;
}*/
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		int p=(int)log2(n);
		printf("%d\n",power(2,p));
	}
   return 0;
}
